name: Grimgrad
description:
Try to survive the hardships of the Middle Ages and not anger the gods. A story campaign about Slavic deities and Survival mode. Lay roads, organize the mining and production of resources, and follow the needs of villagers.

Features:

  • Easy to start playing, even if you are new to city-building games.
  • Defeat pestilence, dirt, hunger, predators and weather while creating a comfortable environment for the villagers.
  • Issue decrees and solve problems, such as a fire in a bakery or a pestilence in a residential area.
  • Lots of random events. Your decisions have consequences.
  • Slavic gods and creatures from folklore. Try to propitiate them and choose the right decision.
